Guys you probably need to download the Red Baron 3D toolkit to get this game to run corectly in XP/Vista/Win 7 etc.

There was also a couple of updates that add servers  and such.

Then there was some Mod Files that makes the graphics 2X-3X times better and even add planes.

Tool Kit is a must though.
